ComicInfo.Summary:
Long Key Island,off the coast of Florida. Jaclyn Hayes - The Demonslayer - is relaxing on vacation. Whilst sunbathing in a forest clearing, Jaclyn is struck by a sudden feeling of unease, and moments later is attacked by a trio of vampires.
She incapacitates two, the third tells her that her presence is requested by their `lord`. Jaclyn runs into the forest,but is followed and ambushed by the remaining vampire and passes out in it`s crushing embrace...
She awakes at the feet of Count Vlad Tepish of Romania - Dracula!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-11-23 08:51:41. [Issue ID 176314]
